metadata.synopsis: Player attacks a guard in the Guard Tower at Cazador's Palace.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe debugbookGo To Region - Act 3 - LOW - Cazador's Palace - Guard TowerKill all the guards except for this one with Ctrl+Shift+K. Then start a fight with this guard.

0.speaker: Merony
0.text: Intruders! The master must not be disturbed!
